title: Lincoln's WARNING #100011: Government Shutdown Day 61
script: Climate summit ends in deadlock. They flew private jets to discuss YOUR footprint. $500 steaks to debate YOUR consumption. Accomplished NOTHING but photo ops. You're taxed for breathing. They sell guilt, you buy compliance. Bitcoin runs renewable. Scan QR. Government Shutdown Day 61? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below.
